Burlingame, CA - TellApart http://www.tellapart.com/

We're hiring Software Engineers, senior and junior, as well as Software Engineers specializing in machine learning. We help eCommerce companies "TellApart" their high value customers from the rest by collecting and making sense of their customer data.

Here are some technical challenges you'll face at TellApart:

- Scale -- build systems that handle tens of thousands of requests per second under strict latency guarantees on behalf of hundreds of millions of users.

- Predictive modeling with huge data sets -- build predictive models that evaluate hundreds of thousands of features in milliseconds.

Email me at mike@tellapart.com for more information and check out our jobs page at http://tellapart.com/company/jobs
